Posted By: tantallum99 (4/9/2011 2:03:17 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: What with Mirrodin Besieged coming up, poor Arty Shovelhead, as nicknamed by [Teferi](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Teferi), is welded onto a throne in the center of Mirrodin, insanely hearing voices and somehow in charge of the phyrexians. He is slightly resisting the corrupting affects of phyrexian oil, so whether he gets redeemed or not probably depends on who wins the war. I bet remembering "[Jhoira](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jhoira) is my friend" will snap him out of it, as that is something he said to himself every night for centuries.

Posted By: GengilOrbios (1/13/2011 9:52:42 AM)

posts.post_content:
We seem to have a lack of correct assumptions. Let me get this straight for you guys:
  
   
[Glissa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glissa) is not a planeswalker. She did, however, come back.
  
[Tezzeret](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tezzeret) is a planeswalker, and he sided with the bad guys.
  
Karn has returned as a planeswalker in New Phyrexia. He did not die. He is back. He is called "[Karn Liberated](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Karn Liberated)". The abilities listed by Chamale are correct, but the last one is worded a bit differently.
  
   
-14 Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanant cards exiled by Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.
  
   
There you have it. Right from the card. By the way, the autocard link for Karn (planeswalker) will work later, they haven't added the new cards into Gatherer yet.
  
   
See http://www.wizards.com/magic/tcg/article.aspx?x=mtg/tcg/newphyrexia/spoiler# for the visual spoiler of all the new cards in New Phyrexia.
posts.html:
We seem to have a lack of correct assumptions. Let me get this straight for you guys:

Glissa is not a planeswalker. She did, however, come back.
Tezzeret is a planeswalker, and he sided with the bad guys.
Karn has returned as a planeswalker in New Phyrexia. He did not die. He is back. He is called "Karn Liberated". The abilities listed by Chamale are correct, but the last one is worded a bit differently.

-14 Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanant cards exiled by Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

There you have it. Right from the card. By the way, the autocard link for Karn (planeswalker) will work later, they haven't added the new cards into Gatherer yet.

See http://www.wizards.com/magic/tcg/article.aspx?x=mtg/tcg/newphyrexia/spoiler# for the visual spoiler of all the new cards in New Phyrexia.
